section.name: Screenshots
section.p: Below you will find a few screenshots from the current version of Svarog.

p.small: This is the main window of Svarog. The central portion of the window is taken up by the display of a signal (in this case EEG). The left portion displays several tree views (in tabs) which aid in navigation over the signal, files, etc. The bottom pane contains property sheets, the console and a task list. Above the signal you can see a tag based hypnogram. The gray block in the signal is an annotation.

span.small: This is the montage editor of Svarog. Montages can be edited by dragging channel symbols with the mouse.
The overlaid FFT view of Svarog. When holding the mouse button down, the FFT of the selected signal fragment is shown.
